706804f-a.text:
Smith Street, east side, between State Street and Atlantic Ave., looking eastward down the center of the block, showing the Willi msburg Savings
Bank in the background.
June 1, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
706804f-a.folder: Smith Street & State Street, Brooklyn, NY

706866f-b.text:
(1)
State Street, north side, just west of Smith Street, showing the
rear of the Old County Court House.
June 1, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, showing also the site for the new Central Courts Building, subseduently erected, which has since 1931, housed the County, Municipal
and City Courts.
June 1, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.

706869f-a.text:
State Street, south side, between Smith and Hoyt Streets.

706868f-b.text:
(1)
State Street, at the N.w. corner of Smith Street, showing site for
the new Central Courts Building to be erected.
October 5, 1929.
L. Sperr.
(2)
The same; showing the new Central Courts Building. This view of its Smith Street side and its rear was taken from State Street.
April 13, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
